Package org.apache.beam.runners.spark.translation

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SparkPipelineTranslator
    Translator to support translation between Dataflow transformations and Spark transformations.
    TransformEvaluator<TransformT extends PTransform<?,?>>
    Describe a PTransform evaluator.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DoFnFunction<InputT,OutputT>
    Dataflow's Do functions correspond to Spark's FlatMap functions.
    EvaluationContext
    Evaluation context allows us to define how pipeline instructions.
    SparkContextFactory
    The Spark context factory.
    SparkPipelineEvaluator
    Pipeline SparkPipelineRunner.Evaluator for Spark.
    SparkProcessContext<InputT,OutputT,ValueT>
    Spark runner process context.
    SparkRuntimeContext
    The SparkRuntimeContext allows us to define useful features on the client side before our data flow program is launched.
    TransformTranslator
    Supports translation between a DataFlow transform, and Spark's operations on RDDs.
    TransformTranslator.FieldGetter
    Getter of the field.
    TransformTranslator.Translator
    Translator matches Dataflow transformation with the appropriate evaluator.
    WindowingHelpers
    Helper functions for working with windows.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SparkProcessContext.SparkProcessException
    Spark process runtime exception.
